name: Chill Challenge
description:
Hi this game requires a prototype heart beat pulse sensor game controller to play.The controller takes the player's pulse, and turns it into a keyboard button press. 

Instructions for the controller can be found at this link: https://github.com/MaxTayler/HeartGameController

Use the Left and Right arrow Keys to simulate button presses from the controller, if you want to test things out.  Without the controller it's basic just a rhythm game.

Thanks Max Tayler
